Nightstrike/alpha:

Nightstrike started to woke up, altough he was stunned to react, he 
noticed that he was tied and inside a sort of vehicle.

Alpah almost started cry when she knew tha Condor was uncounceus, he 
may be tied she tought if he was a decepticon that wouldn't like... 
perhap he never forgive them to do that... 


--- In nbwrpg@y..., RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::Epyon/Hot Rod/Prowl/Skyburst::
> 
> "We are fine. Condor is uncouncious. It was the only way we could 
get
> him," states Epyon.
> 
> Hot Rod notices that Nightstrike is comign too, and seals his hatch.
> "Sorry to but in, but Nightstrike seems to be waking up!"
> 
> "Correction, Condor seems to be waking up. We are not far out. We 
will
> need some back up apon return. We'll need to get him into a cell or
> something," informed Epyon, over the comm.
> 
> Prowl heard this, and cut into the comm channel with his unit.
> "We'll be ready. Myself, Alpha, and a few others will be standing 
by."
> Prowl closed his link, and called Skyburst who was still overseeing
> repairs.
> 
> Skyburst came upto Prowl.
> "What you need?"
> 
> "Some of my guys are coming in with a captured Decepticon. He may 
give
> us some problems. But dont kill him, he was a Maximal once, and we 
would
> like him back."
> 
> "Got it. I'll help," said the Autobot.
